articles.description: Lottie Fry continues Great Britain's equestrian medal success at the Paris Olympics with bronze in the individual dressage.
articles.title: Olympics equestrian: Lottie Fry wins dressage bronze for Great Britain

articles.description: Great Britain's men's wait for a first Olympic medal since 1988 continues after they were beaten in a tense shootout by India in Paris.
articles.title: Olympic hockey: Great Britain's men beaten in shootout by India in quarter-finals

articles.description: Great Britain's Daryll Neita, Dina Asher-Smith and Bianca Williams reach the women's 200m semi-finals at Paris 2024, after world champion Shericka Jackson withdraws.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: British trio progress in 200m but Shericka Jackson withdraws

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Liverpool make it three wins from three on their US tour with a 3-0 win against Manchester United in Columbia, in front of 77,559 fans.
articles.title: Liverpool 3-0 Man Utd: Carvalho, Jones and Tsimikas on target in easy Reds win

articles.description: Taiwanese boxer Lin Yu-ting becomes the second boxer at the centre of a gender eligibility row to secure a medal at the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympic boxing: Lin Yu-ting secures medal amid gender eligibility row

articles.description: Julien Alfred storms to the women's 100m title at Paris 2024 to make history as St Lucia's first Olympic medallist.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Julien Alfred wins 100m gold for St Lucia

articles.description: The scheduled swim familiarisation for Monday's mixed team triathlon is cancelled for the second day in a row at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Practice swim for mixed team triathlon cancelled again

articles.description: An Erling Haaland hat-trick helps Manchester City to a comfortable pre-season win over error-prone Chelsea in Columbus.
articles.title: Man City 4-2 Chelsea: Erling Haaland hat-trick beats Chelsea in pre-season win
